:function(e){var n=t.location&&t.location.hash;return n&&n.slice(1)===e.id},root:function(t){return t===N},focus:function(t){return t===j.activeElement&&(!j.hasFocus||j.hasFocus())&&!!(t.type||t.href||~t.tabIndex)},enabled:s(!1),disabled:s(!0),checked:function(t){var e=t.nodeName.toLowerCase();return"input"===e&&!!t.checked||"option"===e&&!!t.selected},selected:function(t){return t.parentNode&&t.parentNode.selectedIndex,!0===t.selected},empty:function(t){for(t=t.firstChild;t;t=t.nextSibling)if(t.nodeType<6)return!1;return!0},parent:function(t){return!w.pseudos.empty(t)},header:function(t){return dt.test(t.nodeName)},input:function(t){return pt.test(t.nodeName)},button:function(t){var e=t.nodeName.toLowerCase();return"input"===e&&"button"===t.type||"button"===e},text:function(t){var e;return"input"===t.nodeName.toLowerCase()&&"text"===t.type&&(null==(e=t.getAttribute("type"))||"text"===e.toLowerCase())},first:u(function(){return[0]}),last:u(function(t,e){return[e-1]}),eq:u(function(t,e,n){return[n<0?n+e:n]}),even:u(function(t,e){for(var n=0;n<e;n+=2)t.push(n);return t}),odd:u(func
